channel.title: Other Operations on Documaster Noark5 API
channel.description: Recent content in Other Operations on Documaster Noark5 API

item.title: Code Lists Operations
item.description: Overview Code List operations are used to manage the different set of predefined list of values used for different fields in the API.

item.title: Bulk Operations
item.description: Overview Bulk operations allow control over large set of entities for opening and closing them (allowing/disallowing changes to be mode).

item.title: Business Specific Metadata Operations
item.description: Overview Business Specific Metadata operations allow full control over the additional metadata that can be added to extend the core Noark5 entities.

item.title: Access Control Management Operations
item.description: Overview Access Control Management operations provide the capability to control all security aspects of the archive, including access groups and permissions on specific entities.
